entry.name: GNPS - Imaging mass spectrometry of a coral microbe interaction with fungi - Figure 2
entry.description: Title: Imaging mass spectrometry of a coral microbe interaction with fungi Authors: Moree WJ1, Yang JY, Zhao X, Liu WT, Aparicio M, Atencio L, Ballesteros J, Sánchez J, Gavilán RG, Gutiérrez M, Dorrestein PC.
